column3: I ordered a grill chicken caesar on a spinach wrap and I got a grill chicken caeser on a wheat wrap (and surprisingly) with croutons. It was probably the worst wrap I ever had. Too much caesar dressing. And the croutons. I never heard of croutons in a wrap. There was more croutons than chicken. And lets not forget the wheat wrap. I wanted a spinach wrap. I mean not having what I wanted really messed up my lunch. Not a fan.

column4: surprisingly
